flawed_nl_solution:
The fixer used 3/10*400 = <<3/10*400=120>>120 nails to fix the kitchen.
The number of nails remaining in the container after he fixes the kitchen is 400-120 = <<400-120=280>>280
He also uses 7/10*280 = <<7/10*280=169>>169 of the nails remaining in the container to fix the fence.
The total number of nails which the fixer hasn't used is 280-169 = <<280-169=111>>111

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 196, not 169. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
